name: S.T.A.B. M.E. P.L.S
description:
Play as Harrison Hatman, racing driver extraordinaire, as he fights to save the world from an invasion of the Polyhedra. These otherworldly shapes will obstruct our hero before he can reach the goal and with only 60 seconds it's a tall order.

Harrison is a reckless driver so best keep the reset button handy!
